pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stochastic Process Model for Analysis of Longitudinal and Time- to-Event Outcomes // Utilities to estimate parameters of the models with survival functions induced by stochastic covariates. Miscellaneous functions for data preparation and simulation are also provided. For more information, see: (i)"Stochastic model for analysis of longitudinal data on aging and mortality" by Yashin A. et al. (2007), Mathematical Biosciences, 208(2), 538-551, DOI:10.1016/j.mbs.2006.11.006; (ii) "Health decline, aging and mortality: how are they related?" by Yashin A. et al. (2007), Biogerontology 8(3), 291(302), DOI:10.1007/s10522-006-9073-3.
